00019 #include <iostream>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/property_tree/xml_parser.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "FFTProcessor.hpp"
00025 #include "demod_fsk_processor.hpp"
00026 #include "demod_msk_processor.hpp"
00027 #include "network.hpp"
00028 #include "network/iq_adapter.hpp"
00029 #include "network/multi_client.hpp"
00030 #include "processor/registry.hpp"
00031 #include "run.hpp"
00032 #include "wave/writer.hpp"
00033 #include "writer.hpp"
00034 
00035 #include "station_info.hpp"
00036 
00046 namespace network {
00047   namespace client {
00049     class multi_client_tofile : public multi_client, public writer_txt_base {
00050     public:
00051       typedef boost::property_tree::ptree ptree;
00052       multi_client_tofile(const ptree& config)
00053         : multi_client(config)
00054         , writer_txt_base(config.get_child("FileSink"))
00055         , station_info_(config.get<std::string>("StationInfo")) {}
00056 
00057       virtual processor::result_base::sptr dump(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00058         // result -> file
00059         // std::cout << "DUMP: " << rp->name() << " " << rp->to_string() << std::endl;
00060         return dump_result(rp, station_info_.to_string());
00061       }
00062 
00063     protected:
00064     private:
00065       station_info station_info_;
00066     } ;
00067 
00068   } // namespace client
00069 } // namespace network
00070 
00071 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00072 {
00073   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00074   try {
00075     vm = process_options("config/multi_client.xml", argc, argv);
00076   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00077     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00078     return 1;
00079   }
00080 
00081   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00082   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00083   try {
00084     typedef boost::property_tree::ptree ptree;
00085     ptree config;
00086     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00087     const ptree& config_multi_client(config.get_child("MultiClient"));
00088 
00089     // fill spm (stream name -> processor name) multimap
00090     network::client::multi_client::stream_processor_map spm;
00091     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& s,
00092                   config_multi_client.get_child("Streams")) {
00093       if (s.first != "Stream") {
00094         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("ignoring invalid key: '%s'") % s.first));
00095         continue;
00096       }
00097       spm.insert(std::make_pair(s.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.pattern"), s.second.get<std::string>("")));
00098     }
00099 
00100     processor::registry::add<writer_txt>("WriterTXT");
00101     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<wave::writer_iq      > >("WriterIQ");
00102     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<float > > >("FFTProcessor_FLOAT");
00103     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<double> > >("FFTProcessor_DOUBLE");
00104     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_msk_processor>   >("DemodMSK");
00105     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_fsk_processor  > >("DemodFSK");
00106 
00107     network::client::multi_client_tofile c(config_multi_client);
00108 
00109     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00110     BOOST_FOREACH(std::string stream, streams)
00111       std::cout << "-- " << stream << std::endl;
00112 
00113     ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(spm) == true);
00114 
00115     c.start();
00116     run_in_thread(network::get_io_service());
00117   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00118     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00119     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00120     return 1;
00121   }
00122   return 0;
00123 }
